category: Radio: Antique Kindness - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Bonjour je m'appelle Marie. Voici ma maison.
meaning: Hello, my name is Marie. This is my house.

category: Radio: Antique Kindness - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Il y a des arbres dans le jardin.
meaning: There are trees in the garden.

category: Radio: Antique Kindness - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Les arbres sont grands et verts.
meaning: The trees are tall and green.

category: Radio: Antique Kindness - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
Radio: Antique Kindness - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
Radio: White Chairs - Lilly and Strangers
word: Bonjour. Je m’appelle Alice. Ma maison a quatre pièces.
meaning: Hello. My name is Alice. My house has four rooms.

category: Radio: White Chairs - Lilly and Strangers
word: Il y a des chaises blanches dans le salon.
meaning: There are white chairs in the living room.

category: Radio: White Chairs - Lilly and Strangers
word: J'ouvre la fenêtre pour voir les fleurs dans le jardin.
meaning: I open the window to see the flowers in the garden.

category: Radio: White Chairs - Lilly and Strangers
word: Mes voisines sont gentilles et aiment les fleurs aussi.
meaning: My neighbors are kind and like flowers too.

category: Radio: White Chairs - Lilly and Strangers
Radio: Shared Garden - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Bonjour Alice. Tu ouvres la fenêtre?
meaning: Hello Alice. Are you opening the window?

category: Radio: Shared Garden - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui je l’ouvre. Il y a un chien dans la jardin.
meaning: Yes, I open it. There is a dog in the garden.

category: Radio: Shared Garden - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Ah je vois, il y a aussi des fleurs.
meaning: Oh I see, there are also flowers.

category: Radio: Shared Garden - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
Radio: Shared Garden - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: C'est un beau jardin. Le voisin est très gentil de partager.
meaning: It's a beautiful garden. The neighbor is very kind to share.

category: Radio: Shared Garden - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, elle et chaise blanche sont belles aussi.
meaning: Yes, she and white chair are beautiful too.
